en:
违约
(Wéiyuē)

Breach of contract

Definitions of 违约
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

verb
    break a contract
        违约
    violate a treaty
        违约
    go back on one's words
        违约
    break one's promise
        负约, 毁约, 失信, 食言, 违约
